title: Simulation-Based Science Learning Design: Learner-Centered Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental scientific theories and experimental methods
context.additional_context: Personalized science education using VR simulations accessible via smartphones, with continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the science experiment design and analysis process with 80% accuracy through VR simulation
Learners can improve their experimental design at least twice based on peer feedback and formative assessment
Learners can develop at least three strategies using simulation tools for scientific problem-solving

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
